## ModulesOptions.generateScopedName property

To generate custom classes, use the generateScopedName callback, or just pass an interpolated string to the generateScopedName option: `generateScopedName: "[name]__[local]___[hash:base64:5]"`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
generateScopedName?: string | ((name: string, filename: string, css: string) => string);
```
